comments:
It appears that an exception is occurring retrieving variables for the 
variables view.  The message page has not been created yet --> results in an 
NPE.

*** Bug 28128 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

The abstract debug view should note that a "message has been displayed" (but in 
a state too soon to display it), and then display the message when the view is 
actually created.

12/13/02 Lance Phillips : Please note that this bug only seems to occur on 
breakpoints set in code that is running as a plugin.  I seem to be able to set 
breakpoints in regular java code with no problem.  The problem seems to occur 
anytime the breakpoint is set in a class that is running with in the plugin 
environment.  It should also be noted that this plugin code is currently only 
being run from junit test cases.

traces.message: Assertion failed:  ContentViewer must have a content provider when input is set.
